info.title: Picturepark CloudManager API V1
info.description: OpenAPI specification of Picturepark CloudManager API V1

404.description:
Service provoider with this id could not be found
or
Customer with this alias could not be found
or
Entity not found

x-expectedSchemas.description: Service provoider with this id could not be found
Customer with this alias could not be found

or

or

or

processDefinitionId.description: ID of the business process definition associated to the business process.

referenceId.description: ID of the document that is modified by the running of the business process. Used during the cancellation of the business process.

referenceDocType.description: Type of the document that is modified by the running of the business process. Used during the cancellation of the business process.

supportsCancellation.description: True if the business process execution can be cancelled. False otherwise.

lifeCycle.description: Current life cycle of the business process.

stateHistory.description: List containing the history of all the state transitions of the business process.

currentState.description: Current state of the business process.

lastReportedProgress.description: Timestamp when the business process last reported progress.

continuationBusinessProcessId.description: Id of the business process that will be automatically started after the completion of the current one, if any.

BusinessProcessLifeCycle.description: Life cycle of the business process

BusinessProcessState.description: State transition information of a business process

timestamp.description: Date and time of when the state transition was performed.

error.description: Eventual error associated to the state transition.

allOf.description: This exception is an abstract base for permission set validation.
Size of the aggregation is invalid.

aggregationSize.description: The invalid size of the aggregation: size must be equal or greater than 1.

referenceItemId.description: This is the source of the reference.

referenceType.description: This is the DocType of the source of the reference.

exceptions.description: These exceptions describe why the source metadata item could not be updated.

snapshotName.description:
The SnapshotName. Must be unique.
The name usually will be enriched with Reason, ContractVersion and DateTime information.

repositoryName.description: The Repository in which the snapshot will be created.

indices.description: The Indices being part of the snapshot.

snapshotInactive.description: Snapshot also if the entity is inactive.

reason.description: The snapshot backup reason will be added to the snapshot name.

timestamp.description:
Timestamp when creating the requst (utc). If there is a more recent snapshot in the repository, it will keep/return the latest one,
instead of creating a new one.

failures.description: The snapshot elastic search shard failures.

index.description: The Index having the shard failure.

reason.description: The elastic serach shard failure Reason.

snapshotDataType.description:
Limits the returned snapshots to the ones containing data of the specified type (customer, export or history). This search criteria is applied only if no repository name
is specified.

SnapshotDataType.description: Type of data that have been snapshot

snapshotDataType.description: Limits the returned snapshot repositories to the ones containing customer, history or export backups.

emailAddress.description: Email address of the user (doubles as username).

isDeleted.description: Marks a user that was deleted from the system.

CustomerImportRequest.description: Request to import the ElasticSearch repository of a customer from another cloud

snapshotName.description: Name of the snapshot within the ElasticSearch repository if available

storagePath.description: Storage path of the originals and outputs, path shall not include the customer id

resetExternalUserIds.description: Set to true if the customer was configured against another IDS instance

adminUserEmail.description: Provide email address of an admin user

adminUserPassword.description: Provide password for the admin user

ContentBackupSearchRequest.description: Request to search aggregation values for Contents

exclusionTime.description: Time span relative to now for which missing backup timestamp is not considered a missing backup

limit.description: Limits the document count of the result set. Defaults to 30.

pageToken.description: To get a large amount of data, page token returned from the response can be used to get all data.

ContentBackupEnableRequest.description: Request to search aggregation values for Contents

ContentBackupDisableRequest.description: Request to search aggregation values for Contents

ContentBackupCancelRecoveryRequest.description: Request to search aggregation values for Contents

ContentBackupForceCompleteRecoveryReques.description: Request to search aggregation values for Contents

systemLanguages.description: A list of languages serving as system languages.

metadataLanguages.description: A list of languages serving as metadata languages.

defaultLanguage.description: The default language. Not the be confused with the metadata fallback language x-default.

system.description: Marks if this is a system output format.

dynamic.description: A dynamic output format is not rendered automatically, but only on demand.

dataExtraction.description: Specifies if output format should be taken into account during data extraction.

temporary.description: Temporary outputs will not be backed up.

OutputFormatEditable.description: Represents the editable part of the output format.

sourceOutputFormats.description: Which output format should be used as a source of data.

format.description: Information about the technical format of the data, e.g. JPEG, AAC or video still.

retentionTime.description: How long should the dynamic outputs created from this format be kept.

downloadFileNamePatterns.description:
Optional patterns (liquid syntax) that produce the filename for item of this output format.
If set, the customer's default language is required.

TranslatedStringDictionary.description: A custom dictionary type to distinguish language specific class properties.

ResizeAction.description: Does not implement the IImageAction interface. The ResizeAction is directly exposed within ImageFormat.

audioCodec.description: Gets or sets the encoding audio codec.

preset.description: Gets or sets the encoding codec preset.

profile.description: Gets or sets the encoding profile.

coder.description: Gets or sets the encoding coder.

bitrate.description: Gets or sets the bitrate of the encoding.

variableBitRate.description: Gets or sets the encoding variable bit rate (VBR) - 1 is lowest quality and 5 is highest quality.

bitrate.description: Gets or sets the encoding bitrate.

quality.description:
Gets or sets the encoding quality.
Values can be set it range of 0 to 9, where a lower value is a higher quality.

jpegQuality.description: JpegQuality parameter value must be between 0 and 100.

userRoleIds.description: IDs of user roles user is assigned to

emailAddress.description: Email address of the user (doubles as username).

authorizationState.description: Authorization state the user is currently in.

lifeCycle.description: Life cycle state the user is currently in.

isSupportUser.description: The support user is a user created for Picturepark support personnel.

isReadOnly.description: Read-only users can't be removed from the system, e.g. service user.

filters.description: The filters to put in "and". All kinds of filters are accepted.
The filters to put in "or". All kinds of filters are accepted.

allOf.description: Filters over a range of date time values

field.description:
The field's name to execute the filter on. It is composed by the field ids of the hierarchy joined with "."
(i.e. personLayer.address.street).

DateRange.description: The date time range class used in filters

from.description: The from value: it can be a datetime string or a pattern now(+-)(int)(YMDHm).

to.description: The to value: it can be a datetime string or a pattern now(+-)(int)(YMDHm).

allOf.description: Filters over the existence of a field's value

field.description:
The field's name to execute the filter on. It is composed by the field ids of the hierarchy joined with "."
(i.e. personLayer.address.street).

allOf.description: Filters geo point values based on a bounding box

field.description:
The field's name to execute the filter on. It is composed by the field ids of the hierarchy joined with "."
(i.e. personLayer.address.street).

topLeft.description: The top left corner of the bounding box's geo location (latitude and longitude).

bottomRight.description: The bottom right corner of the bounding box's geo location (latitude and longitude).

GeoLocation.description: It stores geo location information (latitude and longitude)

allOf.description: Filters within the radius of the distance from a location

field.description:
The field's name to execute the filter on. It is composed by the field ids of the hierarchy joined with "."
(i.e. personLayer.address.street).

location.description: The point of origin to calculate the distance from (latitude/longitude).

distance.description: The distance in meters from the point of origin.

path.description: The path pointing to the nested document (i.e. personLayer.nestedAddress).

filter.description: The filter to be applied on the nested documents.

allOf.description: Filters over a range of numeric values

field.description:
The field's name to execute the filter on. It is composed by the field ids of the hierarchy joined with "."
(i.e. personLayer.address.street).

range.description: The numeric range on which filtering.

allOf.description: Filters field's values based on a prefix

field.description:
The field's name to execute the filter on. It is composed by the field ids of the hierarchy joined with "."
(i.e. personLayer.address.street).

prefix.description: The value to be used as prefix.

allOf.description: Filters values exactly containing a term

field.description:
The field's name to execute the filter on. It is composed by the field ids of the hierarchy joined with "."
(i.e. personLayer.address.street).

term.description: The value to use to filter on.

allOf.description: Filters values containing at least one of the terms

field.description:
The field's name to execute the filter on. It is composed by the field ids of the hierarchy joined with "."
(i.e. personLayer.address.street).

terms.description: The list of values to be filtered on. At least one must match to return results.

aggregationName.description: The name of the aggregation this filter is connected to.

temporaryAggregatorRequestId.description: Autogenerated Guid at request time, for precise aggregation result mapping.

childType.description: The type of the child document.

filter.description: The filter to be applied on the child document. All kinds of filters are accepted.

parentType.description: The type of the parent document.

filter.description: The filter to be applied on the child document. All kinds of filters are accepted.

valueToRemove.description: Existing boost value that is going to be removed.

valueToReplaceWith.description: Boost value that is going to replace the removed one where it was used.

boostValuesToAdd.description: List of boost values that need to be added to the existing ones.

boostValuesToRemove.description: List of existing boost values that need to be removed.

contractVersion.description: The contract version of the environment configuration.

lifeCycle.description: Curent lifecycle state of the entity.

VersionInfo.description: The version view item for the environment.

fileVersion.description: The manual file version of Picturepark.Contract.dll.

fileProductVersion.description: The GitVersionTask generated file product version of Picturepark.Configuration.dll.

contractVersion.description: The current contract version stored in CustomerDoc / EnvironmentDoc.

release.description: The bamboo release version. Only provided on bamboo deployments.

start.description: Defines the offset from the first result you want to fetch. Defaults to 0.

limit.description: Limits the document count of the result set. Defaults to 30.

outputIds.description: List of output IDs you want to filter on. If this field is not empty, the other will be ignored.

contentIds.description: List of Content IDs you want to filter on.

fileExtensions.description: The file extension of the outputs you want to filter on.

outputFormatIds.description: The IDs of the output formats you want to filter on.

includeCompleted.description: Should the successful filter results also be reset (and subsequently re-rendered)?

UpdateInfo.description: The UpdateInfoViewItem is the view item for update commands.

updateVersion.description: The version of the update command.

objectStoreVersion.description: The version of the object store (elastic search) at the time of the update command creation.

creationDate.description: The creation date of the update command.

description.description: The description of the update command.

creator.description: The creator of the update command.

targetVersion.description:
The maximal target version.
In case the highest available update version is lower than the desired target version, the environments's contract version will be raised to the highest available update version.

allOf.description: The version view item for the customer.

targetVersion.description:
The maximal target version.
In case the highest available update version is lower than the desired target version, the customer's contract version will be raised to the highest available update version.
